effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User charges for one turn before attacking. Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Searches out weak spots, then strikes the next turn.

flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A 2nd-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. The foe may flinch.
